APR FC vs AS Kigali

APR FC 2-2 AS Kigali

Uko umukino uri kugenda

Umwanditsi

: Eric Tony Ukurikiyimfura

Amafoto

: Ntare Julius

17:29

APR FC ishobora gutakaza umwanya wa mbere

Kunganya uyu mukino bitumye APR FC igira amanota 59 ku mwanya wa mbere, isigara irusha amanota abiri ikipe ya Rayon Sports ya kabiri.

Gikundiro ishobora gufata umwanya wa mbere mu gihe yatsinda Police FC izayakira ku Cyumweru kuri Stade Amahoro.

Tubashimire abo twabanye uyu munsi kuri uyu mukino, tuzasubire ku Cyumweru tubagezaho umukino wa Police FC na Rayon Sports.

17:26

Umukino urarangiye: Amakipe yombi agabanye amanota

APR FC inganyije na AS Kigali ibitego 2-2 mu mukino waberaga i Nyamirambo. AS Kigali igize amanota 34 ku mwanya wa gatandatu mu gihe APR FC igize amanota 59 ku mwanya wa mbere

17:26

90+3' APR FC iri gusatira bikomeye

Hakizimana Muhadjiri yinjiranye umupira mu rubuga rw'amahina, abakinnyi ba AS Kigali, Ngandu Omar na Bishira Latif baramuzibira

17:21

90' Iminota y'inyongera

Umusifuzi wa kane ashyizeho iminota ine y'inyongera

17:21

88' Igitego cya kabiri cya APR FC

Danny Usengimana ahinduye umupira mwiza mu rubuga rw'amahina, ushyirwa mu rushundura na Hakizimana Muhadjiri utsinze igitego cya 14 muri shampiyona.

17:19

86' Coup-franc ya APR FC

Ndarusanze Jean Claude akiniye nabi Hakizimana Muhadjiri, umupira uhanwe n'uyu mukinnyi ukubita izamu ujya hanze. Ni umupira we wa gatandatu ukubise izamu muri uyu mukino.

17:16

83' Igitego cya AS Kigali

Rugwiro Herve ananiwe guhagarika Nshimiyimana Ibrahim winjiye mu kibuga mukanya, bagerana mu rubuga rw'amahina, Kimenyi wari usohotse abisikana n'agapira gatewe n'uyu mukinnyi wa AS Kigali, kajya mu izamu.

17:15

82' Gusimbuza kwa APR FC

Ntwari Evode asimbuye Byiringiro Lague ku ruhande rwa APR FC

17:12

79' Gusimbuza kwa AS Kigali

Ishimwe Kevin wari wazonze APR FC, asimbuwe na Nshimiyimana Ibrahim ku ruhande rwa AS Kigali.

17:09

75' APR FC ikomeje guhusha ibitego

Hakizimana Muhadjiri, Mugiraneza na Danny Usengimana bahushije uburyo bwashoboraga guha APR FC igitego cya kabiri.

17:01

73' Gusimbuza kwa AS Kigali

Cyitegetse Bogarde yinjiye mu kibuga asimbura Ntamuhanga Tumaini wakinnye nabi uyu munsi.

16:58

70' Coup-franc ya APR FC

Ngandu Omar akiniye nabi Byiringiro Lague ku murongo w'urubuga rw'amahina ahagana kuri koruneri. Umupira utewe na Muhadjiri ufata ipoto y'izamu ujya hanze.

16:56

64' Gusimbuza kwa APR FC

Nshuti Dominique Savio wakinaga neza, asimbuwe na Itangishaka Blaise ku ruhande rwa APR FC.

16:54

62' Bate Shamiru ahagaze neza

APR FC ibonye uburyo bugana mu izamu, Hakizimana Muhadjiri ateye umupira ugana mu izamu ifatwa na Bate Shamiru. Umukino uhagaze gato havurwa umukinnyi wa AS Kigali uryamye hasi.

16:53

61' Amakipe yombi ari guhanahana neza

Muri iyi minota, amakipe yombi yashyize hasi umupira abakinnyi bari guhanahana.

16:49

56' APR FC ihushije igitego cyabazwe

APR FC ihushije igitego cyabazwe ku buryo bubiri bubonywe na Hakizimana Muhadjiri, umupira wa mbere awutera mu izamu n'umutwe ukurwamo na Bate Shamiru, wongeye kumugarukira akozaho ikirenge ujya hanze.

16:46

52' Gusimbuza kwa APR FC

Nshimiyimana Imran asimbuwe na Danny Usengimana. APR FC igiye gukinisha abakinnyi babiri imbere, Muhadjiri na Savio bakine inyuma yabo.

16:45

51' Ikarita y'umuhondo

Rugwiro Herve akiniye nabi Ssentongo Saifi ahabwa ikarita y'umuhondo

16:41

AS Kigali iri gusatira bikomeye

AS Kigali yongeye guhusha uburyo biwza ku mupira uhinduwe na Ssentongo Saifi, umupira ukomeza imbere y'izamu,habura uwukoraho.

16:40

48' Igitego cya AS Kigali

As Kigali yishyuriwe na Ndarusanze Jean Claude ku mupira wari uvuye muri koruneri itewe na Ishimwe Kevin. Kugeza ubu amakipe yombi aranganya igitego 1-1.

16:39

46' Gusimbuza kwa AS Kigali

Murengezi Rodrigue utarihiriwe n'umukino w'uyu munsi asimbuwe na Ndayisenga Fuadi

16:36

Igice cya kabiri kiratangiye

Ikipe ya AS Kigali itangije igice cya kabiri kuri Stade ya Kigali. Ssentongo Saifi (Ruhinda) atanga umupira kuri Nsabimana Eric

16:18

Igice cya mbere kirarangiye

16:16

42' Coup-franc ya AS Kigali

Buregeya Prince akiniye nabi Ruhinda Farouk, ikosa rihanwe na Ishimwe Kevin umupira ushyirwa muri koruneri na Rugwiro Herve

16:12

39' AS Kigali iri gukora amakosa menshi

Nyuma y'aho Niyomugabo akiniye nabi Byiringiro Lague, Benedata akiniye nabi Mangwende,ikosa rihanwa na Hakizimana Muhadjiri.

16:09

36' Gusatira kwa APR FC

Hakizimana Muhadjiri wasubiye inyuma gushaka umupira, awuhaye Nshuti Savio Dominique yinjira mu rubuga rw'amahina, ateye mu izamu ufatwa na Bate Shamiru.

16:07

33' AS Kigali ikomeje gusatira

Nyuma yo gutsindwa igitego, AS Kigali ikomeje kwiharira umupira isatira APR FC. Niyomugabo Jean Claude, Ruhinda Farouk na Ishimwe Kevin bari gukina neza muri iyi minota.

16:01

28' Igitego cya APR FC

Ku mupira uvuye mu ruhande ahagana muri koruneri, Byiringiro Lague wari hagati y'abakinnyi ba AS Kigali anyujije ukugura hagati yabo, abatsinda igitego.

16:00

26' Umupira ugaruwe n'ipoto na none

Hakizimana Muhadjiri yongeye kuzamukana umupira acenga Bishira Latif, ateye mu izamu umupira ugarurwa n'umutambiko w'izamu ku nshuro ya kabiri.

15:58

25' AS Kigali yahindukanye APR FC

Birasa n'aho APR FC yatakaje umuvuduko yari ifite, AS Kigali ni yo iri gusatira cyane muri iyi minota n'ubwo na APR FC inyuzamo ikagerageza uburyo bugana mu izamu.

15:54

20' AS Kigali ihushije igitego cyabazwe

Niyomugabo Jean Claude akinannye na Ishimwe Kevin, ahereza Ndarusanze Jean Claude wari wenyine mu rubuga rw'amahina, atera umupira uca ku ruhande rw'izamu rya Kimenyi Yves. Bwari uburyo bw'igitego.

15:47

15' AS Kigali yari ibonye ubundi buryo

Murengezi Rodrigue akinannye na Ishimwe Kevin uhinduye umupira ukomeye mu rubuga rw'amahina ukurwamo na Kimenyi Yves. APR FC na yo ibonye uburyo bwiza ku ikosa rikorewe kuri Muhadjiri waryihaniye, umupira ufatwa na Bate.

15:45

Ubundi buryo bwa APR FC

Ikipe y'ingabo z'igihugu iri gukoresha uruhande rw'ibumoso cyane isatira AS Kigali. Imanishimwe Emmanuel yinjiranye umupira ateye ishoti rikomeye rica imbere y'izamu rya Bate Shamiru, umupira urarenga.

15:44

11' AS Kigali ihushije igitego

Ku mupira izamukanye kuri contre-attaque, AS Kigali ihushije igitego cyabazwe ku mupira utewe na Ndarusanze Jean Claude umupira ugarurwa na Omborenga Fitina.

15:43

9' APR FC ikomeje gusatira

Imanishimwe Emmanuel ahinduye umupira mu rubuga rw'amahina, Bishira awukura ku kirenge cya Lague, awushyira muri koruneri itewe na Muhajdiri umupira ufatwa na Bate Shamiru

15:41

8' Umupira ugaruwe n'umutambiko w'izamu

Muhadjiri Hakizimana acenze ba myugariro babiri ba AS Kigali, atera ishoti rikomeye mu izamu umupira ugarurwa n'umutambiko w'izamu. APR FC yatangiye isatira cyane muri uyu mukino

15:38

5' Coup-franc ya APR FC

Benedata Janvier akoreye ikosa kuri Nshuti Savio, ikosa rihanwe na Hakizimana Muhadjiri wohereje umupira mu rubuga rw'amahina, ugarurwa n'umukinnyi wa AS Kigali ugeze kuri Imran ntiyabasha kuwutera.

15:37

4' Ally ateye umupira hanze

Niyonzima Ally ahawe umupira mu kibuga hagati, ashaka gutungura umunyezamu Bate Shamiru ku ishoti rya kure, umupira ujya hanze.

15:35

3' APR FC ihushije igitego cyabazwe

Ku mupira uzamukanywe na Nshuti Savio Dominique mu ruhande rw'ibumoso, awuhinduye imbere y'izamu, Byiringiro Lague awutanga Bate Shamiru, ashyizeho umutwe ujya hanze.

15:33

Umukino uratangiye

Umukino uhuje APR FC na AS Kigali umaze gutangira, aho uyobowe na Ngabonziza. AS Kigali itangiye isatira APR FC ariko Murengezi akora ikosa rihanwe na Rugwiro Herve.

15:31

Abakinnyi bagiye kubanzamo ku mpande zombi:

APR FC: Kimenyi Yves, Omborenga Fitina, Imanishimwe Emmanuel, Rugwiro Herve, Buregeya Prince, Mugiraneza Jean Baptiste (c), Nshuti Savio Dominique, Byiringiro Lague, Hakizimana Muhadjiri, Nshimiyimana Imran na Niyonzima Ally.

Umutoza: Mateso Jean de Dieu

15:25

Uko APR FC na AS Kigali zitwaye mu mikino iheruka

15:20

AS Kigali ikunda gushobora APR FC

Mu myaka ya shampiyona irindwi iheruka, nta na rimwe APR FC yabashije gutsinda AS Kigali mu mukino ubanza nâ€™uwo kwishyura. Muri uyu mwaka, APR FC yatsinze umukino ubanza ku bitego 3-0.

APR FC iheruka gutsinda AS Kigali mu mikino yombi ya shampiyona mu mwaka wâ€™imikino 2011/12.

15:16

Gahunda yâ€™umunsi wa 26 wa shampiyona

Uretse uyu mukino wo kuri uyu wa Gatanu, andi makipe azakina ku wa Gatandatu, andi ku Cyumweru:

AS Muhanga vs SC Kiyovu (Stade Muhanga)
Marines FC vs Gicumbi FC (Stade Umuganda)

Ku Cyumweru

Police FC vs Rayon Sports FC (Stade Amahoro)

15:15

APR FC irashaka kongera gushyiramo ikinyuranyo hagati yayo na Rayon Sports

Kugeza ubu, APR FC iri ku gitutu cyo kongera gusiga Rayon Sports yaraye inyagiye Espoir FC hagasigaramo inota rimwe ryâ€™ikinyuranyo. Mu gihe iyi kipe yâ€™ingabo zâ€™igihugu yatsinda uyu mukino wo kuri uyu wa Gatanu, irongera irushe Rayon Sports amanota ane, yo izakirwa na Police FC ku Cyumweru.

APR FC nitsindwa cyangwa ikanganya, Rayon Sports izaba ifite amahirwe menshi yo gufata umwanya wa mbere niramuka itsinze Police FC.

15:13

Ikaze kuri Stade ya Kigali i Nyamirambo

Tubahaye ikaze ku mukino ubimburiye iyindi yâ€™umunsi wa 26 wa shampiyona ugiye kubera kuri Stade ya Kigali i Nyamirambo hagati ya APR FC na AS Kigali. APR FC ni iya mbere nâ€™amanota 58 mu gihe AS Kigali iri ku mwanya wa gatandatu nâ€™amanota 33.

Amakipe yombi ntiyari yahiriwe mu mikino yakinnye muri iki cyumweru kuko APR FC yanganyije na Kiyovu Sports naho AS Kigali itsindwa na Gicumbi FC.
